com.compendium.core.db
Class DBMediaIndex

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBMediaIndex

public class DBMediaIndex
extends java.lang.Object

The DBMediaIndex class serves as the interface layer between the MediaIndex objects and the MediaIndex table in the database.

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Field Summary
static java.lang.String GET_ALL_MEDIAINDEXES_QUERY
          SQL statement to return the MediaIndex records with the given NodeID.
static java.lang.String GET_MEDIAINDEX_QUERY
          SQL statement to return the MediaIndex record with the given ViewID, NodeID and MeetingID.

static java.lang.String SET_MEDIAINDEX_QUERY
          SQL statement to update the MediaIndex column for the MediaIndex record with the given ViewID and NodeID.

getMediaIndex

public static MediaIndex getMediaIndex(DBConnection dbcon,
                                       java.lang.String sViewID,
                                       java.lang.String sNodeID,
                                       java.lang.String sMeetingID)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns the MediaIndex for given node reference in the given view and for the given meeting.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sViewID, - the id of the view the node is in.
sNodeID, - the id of the node to return the position for.
sMeetingID, - the id of the meeting for the medai index to return.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.MediaIndex, the MediaIndex of the node in the view, in the meeting.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
